text:
Dragon Inn introduces New Authentic Huaiyang Set Menus
New Authentic Huaiyang Set Dinner Menus
Come and try the newly launched authentic Huaiyang Set dinner menus at our award-winning Dragon Inn from Monday to Sunday, 6pm to 11pm. Set dinner menus for 2, 4 and 8 persons – priced at $308, $588 and $988 respectively, with choices of Huaiyang snacks, nourishing soup, Dragon Inn specialties, rice and desserts, are now available to accommodate gatherings of different scales.
Set dinner menus feature an expansive selection of classic Huaiyang delights, where guests could select 4 Huaiyang snacks, 1 nourishing soup, 5 Dragon Inn specialties with Pan-fried Pork Dumplings/Pan-fried Pork Buns and desserts for the 8-person set menu. Choices of delicacies include:
Huaiyang Snack Selection: Signature Pork Terrine with Vinegar Jelly, Smoked Fish in Sweet Soy Sauce, Shredded Chicken with Mung Bean Noodles, Assorted Marinated Spiced Beef Shank, etc.
Nourishing Soup Selection: Hot and Sour Soup, Fish Broth with Diced Mandarin Fish, Tianjin Cabbage Soup with Yunnan Ham, etc.
Dragon Inn Specialties Selection: Stir-fried Diced Chicken with Chili and Cashew Nuts, Beef Tendon and Shank Stewed with Shrimps, Chicken and Yunnan Ham, Stewed Mandarin Fish Fillet in Rice Wine Sauce, Sautéed Sliced Beef with Peking Spring Onions, etc.
New Dim Sum Menu and Authentic Huaiyang Set Lunch
For those who want to try something different in the afternoon, an authentic Huaiyang lunch would be a great choice for you. Apart from the new authentic Huaiyang Set Dinner, Dragon Inn has also revamped its Huaiyang style dim sum menu and the set lunch with a selection of new items. The Authentic Huaiyang Set Lunch priced at $118 per person (minimum 2 persons), with 4 delicious dim sum of your choice alongside the nourishing soup, Huaiyang starters, vegetables, fried rice/noodles as well as dessert, available from Monday to Friday, 12noon to 3pm. Chef recommendations include Puff Pastry Cakes with Minced Pork and Ham, Spring Rolls with Shredded Duck, Steamed Dumplings with Four Kinds of Vegetables, Fried Rice with River Shrimps and Yunnan Ham,Fried Rice Puddings with Lamb and Vegetables, etc.
Perfect for your private parties and celebrations, Dragon Inn offers 6 highly versatile multi-function rooms with authentic Chinese ambience and customized Huaiyang menus on request.
Prices stated in Hong Kong dollars and subject to 10% service charge.
Terms and conditions apply, please contact restaurant staff for details.
Dragon Inn
Address: 1/F, Regal Riverside Hotel, 34-36 Tai Chung Kiu Road, Shatin, Hong Kong Business Hours: Monday to Saturday 12:00 noon – 3:00 pm; 6:00 pm – 11:00 pm Sunday and Public Holiday 9:00 am – 3:00 pm; 6:00 pm – 11:00 pm Reservations: 2132 1153
